subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: Halep, seeded third at Wimbledon, was able to restrict Diyas to only four forehand winners on Tuesday after she had averaged 14 forehand winners in her first three matches.
snippet: Halep, seeded third at Wimbledon, was able to restrict Diyas to only four forehand winners on Tuesday after she had averaged 14 forehand winners in her first three matches.
